common.title: QuitMate | Addiction Recovery SNS
common.description: An anonymous community app to help you break free from alcohol, gambling, smoking, porn, and other addictions.

hero.title: You don't have to quit alone
hero.description: An anonymous community app to help you break free from alcohol, gambling, smoking, porn, and other addictions.

intro.title: A supportive social network for addiction recovery
intro.description: Struggling to quit? You're not alone. QuitMate is a safe, anonymous space where people facing similar challenges come together to support each other in overcoming addictions and unhealthy habits.

feature1.title: Communities focused on your struggle
feature1.description: Connect with others going through the same thing. Choose from alcohol, gambling, binge eating, smoking, social media, gaming, plastic surgery, shopping, porn, drugs, caffeine, and codependency.

feature2.title: Share your journey. Get support.
feature2.description: Post your feelings and progress openly—or privately. Get encouragement, tips, and empathy from others. No real name or photo required.

feature3.title: Track your clean time
feature3.description: See how long you've stayed addiction-free. Each hour and day adds up, helping you stay motivated through small wins.

testimonial1.name: Gambling Recovery
testimonial1.title: This app changed everything
testimonial1.message: My family member had a serious gambling problem. Therapy didn't help, and we were at a loss. But after finding this app, they suddenly stopped gambling. The support from others with similar experiences has made a huge difference. We're so thankful.

testimonial2.name: Alcohol Recovery
testimonial2.title: Support even after relapse
testimonial2.message: Such a great app. Some people here have been sober for over 100 days. We support each other, share ideas, and keep moving forward together.

testimonial3.name: Binge Eating Recovery
testimonial3.title: I wish I found it sooner
testimonial3.message: I really wish I had discovered this app earlier. But even now, finding it feels like such a gift. I'm so glad I did.

final-cta.title: Take the first step with others by your side
final-cta.description: With QuitMate, your will to quit becomes the strength to keep going.

store-badges.title: App Store
store-badges.description: Rated 4.9+ stars on the App Store.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with the QuitMate team here.

blog.title: Blog | QuitMate
blog.description: QuitMate official blog. Find information and the latest news about addiction recovery.
blog.journal-description: Insights, stories, and updates to support your recovery journey
blog.content-preparing: Content is being prepared. Please check back soon.

common.title: Alcohol-Free Week | Try going alcohol-free for one week
common.description: Alcohol-Free Week is an app to help you seriously challenge yourself to quit or abstain from alcohol for just one week.

hero.title: Try going alcohol-free for one week
hero.description: An app to help you seriously challenge yourself to quit or abstain from alcohol for just one week. Review your daily alcohol intake and support your 7-day journey to reset your mind and body.

intro.title: Challenge yourself to quit alcohol for just one week
intro.description: Deciding to never drink alcohol again is tough, but doesn't 'just one week' sound more manageable? Review your daily alcohol intake and support your 7-day journey to reset your mind and body.

feature1.title: One-week alcohol-free program
feature1.description: Having a clear goal makes it easier to stay motivated. Start by completing your first week. By building small successes, you'll find yourself able to stay alcohol-free for longer. Your progress is visualized through the habit tracker feature.

feature2.title: Daily support articles
feature2.description: Receive one daily tip from 'alcohol-free experts' about changes in your body during abstinence and strategies to resist cravings. Control your alcohol cravings through knowledge.

feature3.title: Connect with others in the same situation
feature3.description: Connect with people who started their alcohol-free journey on the same day, users with similar progress, and experienced users who have maintained long-term sobriety. Realizing 'I'm not alone in this struggle' is the fastest path to success. Share your challenges and successes, and support each other.

testimonial1.name: Sobriety Community
testimonial1.title: This app changed everything
testimonial1.message: I started my journey to quit drinking and found this app. The support from others with similar experiences has made a huge difference. I'm so thankful.

testimonial2.name: Sobriety Community
testimonial2.title: Support even after relapse
testimonial2.message: Such a great app. Some people here have been sober for over 100 days. We support each other, share ideas, and keep moving forward together.

testimonial3.name: Sobriety Community
testimonial3.title: I wish I found it sooner
testimonial3.message: I really wish I had discovered this app earlier. But even now, finding it feels like such a gift. I'm so glad I did.

final-cta.title: Start your alcohol-free challenge today to regain your best health!
final-cta.description: What matters for protecting your health is not temporary restraint, but 'changing your habits.' This app is more than just a tracking tool—it creates an opportunity to change how you relate to alcohol.

store-badges.title: App Store
store-badges.description: Rated 4.9+ stars on the App Store.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Read Alcohol-Free Week's terms of service.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with the Alcohol-Free Week team here.
